Question
========

There are three small populations of students in different STEM subjects, each with an average of 30. Below are the values in each population:____________ I 10, 50\ II 10, 20, 30, 40, 50. III 20, 30, 40. \ Which population has the smallest standard error?

![](uva-sample-mean-1288-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* A
* B
* C

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A: Incorrect
* B: Incorrect
* C: Correct
